title: Directors: Life Behind the Camera
description: Featuring close to four hours of interviews with directors such as Martin Scorsese. Spike Lee and Clint Eastwood, "Directors:" is an innovative two-disc interactive experience in which 33 directors discuss all the aspects of filmmaking. The set allows instant access to a single director or an entire topic involving all participating directors.
